title: I Literally Just Told You
overview: I Literally Just Told You is the only game show in history where the contestants are given every answer with the questions written, literally, as the show is happening. You just need to pay attention to everything that's going on.With each correct answer adding more cash to their prize pot, can the competitors keep their focus and remember the things they've seen and heard just minutes before?In the dramatic finale, the remaining two contestants set each other questions. It's a chaotic battle of wits.
